mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_comment (post_id, family_member_id, content, created_at) VALUES (#{postId}, #{familyMemberId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post_comment WHERE post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM post_comment WHERE id = #{id} AND family_member_id = #{familyMemberId}
